resources.string: Is someone using your wifi without your permission? want to find who are they? Download Who\'sConnected? app now, this app will show you who and how many devices are connected to your wifi device. Along with finding devices connected to your wifi, this app additionally provide features like know your public ip, Ping a device and find open ports.

This app is made to help user to see who are connected to their wifi, this application additionally have features like pinging a server, port scanning and also helps you to find your public IP address.

string.name: app_icon_strin

resources.string: All the icons used in this application are downloaded from flaticon

string-array.name: boarding_text_array
string-array.item: An app which will find who are connected to your wifi
In addition, this app also does the following for you
1). Show your public IP\n2). Ping a device on network\n3). Find open port of a device

string-array.name: boarding_sub_title_texts
string-array.item: Do you feel someone is stealing your wifi? find them out using Who\'sConnected
Change device name according to your choice
In addition, this app also show your public IP, ping a device and find open ports of a device
